QuestData.Title: Mistblade Destruction
QuestData.Description: Korven has told me of his findings. There is an enormous amber deposit sitting at the bottom of the Lake of Stars.$B$BUnfortunately, a hostile saurok tribe lives at the edge of the lake, and revere the amber as their own.$B$BThey will not allow us to enter their territory easily.$B$BGo south to the lake. Kill the Mistblade saurok, so that we can more easily harvest the nearby amber.
